text: Department of Cundinamarca (Departamento de Cundinamarca, ) is one of the 32 departments of Colombia. Its area is (not including the Capital District) and 2,598,245 people lived here in 2013. Cundinamarca is in the center of Colombia. Cundinamarca's capital city is Bogot√°, the capital of Colombia.
title: Cundinamarca Department
